title: Learning Design Strategy Development through Participatory Workshops

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program focusing on developing field-applicable learning design strategies for practitioners with diverse cultural backgrounds, utilizing simple digital tools based on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more principles of learner-centered module design through participatory workshops.
Learners can derive five or more learning design strategies suitable for diverse cultural contexts.
Learners can develop two or more field-applicable learning activities executable in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
